name: Shoot Them (before they jump)
description:
Shoot suicidal workers in a dystopian future. Do not let them jump off the roofs, think of what will happen to the company's property if it is bombarded with dead, splatting bodies...

This is a small side project I have been working on, and it is my first ever upload to itch.io.

It is small, it is stupid, it is unpolished, but it may be a source of some fun!

There is an option to donate, but PLEASE DO NOT DONATE ANYTHING BEFORE AT LEAST HAVING TESTED THE GAME. This game is not worth spending money on. However, the option is there in case you would like to buy me a coup of coffee, which would be much appreciated as I continue work on other projects.

There may be small bugs, but there should not be anything game breaking. However, please tell me if you discover a bug!

There might be limited support for this game. It was developed with a very short time frame, and I am working on a much larger project, which is my main focus. This was meant to be a short side project, so I will only update or bug fix it if major bugs are discovered, or if (somehow) this game gains any traction.
